<sim>.name: Sim
<sim>.info: She is a veteran actress known for her charismatic presence and deep emotional expression. Her warm smile contrasts with her strong, commanding roles on screen.

<wei>.name: Wei
<wei>.info: He exudes quiet strength and sophistication, often portraying serious and intense characters. His minimalist style enhances his charismatic presence.

<jae>.name: Jae
<jae>.info: Known for his commanding presence and mature charm, he often takes on pivotal, emotionally complex roles. His sharp gaze adds weight to every performance.

<park>.name: Park
<park>.info: An elegant actress with a modern and poised style, she brings sophistication to her roles. Her calm gaze and confident stance show her composure and strength.
